title: Zuri Coffee Website
description: E-commerce website with custom checkout and CMS

title: Book Landing Page
description: Book landing page showcasing clean design, responsive structure, and a user-focused approach to digital storytelling.

title: Book Cover Design-The Unseen Crown.
description: Crafted a bold and visually striking cover for e-book The Unseen Crown, a transformational book that explores themes of hidden greatness, identity, and purpose. The design captures the essence of hidden royalty, greatness shaped in solitude..not spotlight. The use of shadows and intense expression reflects the weight of unspoken dreams and the power of inner transformation.

title: Urban Eats Restaurant
description: A visually captivating promotional design for a premium coffee brand, crafted to awaken both sense and sales. The design blends rich earthy tones, inviting typography, and imagery that evokes warmth and energy;perfect morning routines and lifestyle branding.

title: Digital Skills Workshop
description: Planned and facilitated an engaging digital skills workshop tailored for youth and early professionals, covering key tools like Google Workspace, Canva, Data Analysis and Management, Freelancing and Basic Cybersecurity Practices.

title: Cybersecurity Awareness Poster
description: Designed a poster for cybersecuity awareness training aimed at educating beginners on online safety and protection practices.
